name: Get Off My Lawn (Struckdown)
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/get-my-lawn-4

In January 2019, four friends set out to make a game for the Global Game jam. Out of that, emerged this work of art. Play as Grams, fight off construction works and save your home!

WASD to move

J - Light attack (Each third attack stuns)

K - Heavy attack (does more damage)
